attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern:

This legislation for a proposed rate increase is ridiculous. Families seeking
adoption are already charged tens of thousands of dollars - all for a service that
rescues orphan children and gives them oportunity for a better life. The CIS
service is already cumbersome, in that it is only valid for 18 months yet it is the
first document due! Many families end up paying this fee twice. Stop being a
bureaucrat for just long enough to realize how hard American families are working
to adopt a child that in all likelyhood they are unable to have on their own. These
prices should not be monopolistic, with the government able to set the price due
to the fact there are no other options for adopting a foreign child. The child we are
striving to adopt will be a hard-working, patriotic, tax paying citizen. Evaluate the
lifetime value of this and I am sure you will reconsider this increase.

Regards,

Chris and Jessica Thomas
U.S. Citizens
International Adoption Applicants

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Chris D. Thomas
